bill.summary: 2/16/1993--Introduced. Amends the Federal Employees' Group Life Insurance Act of 1980 to provide for the establishment of a one-year period during which certain Federal employees who retired on an immediate annuity or became entitled to receive compensation for work injury before December 9, 1980, shall be allowed to resume coverage under the Federal Employees' Group Life Insurance Program, including coverage under the optional insurance programs.
